body:
It isn't strictly necessary to use nomnigraph, but the transformations need to know about that and use string comparison instead of `isa<ClassName>()` style checks (which are substantially more efficient).

I've tried to make it as seamless as possible with ops.def syntax for adding new classes, though
body_html:

I've tried to make it as seamless as possible with ops.def syntax for adding new classes, though
body_text:
It isn't strictly necessary to use nomnigraph, but the transformations need to know about that and use string comparison instead of isa<ClassName>() style checks (which are substantially more efficient).
I've tried to make it as seamless as possible with ops.def syntax for adding new classes, though
